entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of drizzle or rain. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning. A few rain showers beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
